Assessment.QuestionText: You want to display six calendars at a time, each having three columns and two rows. Which one of the following codes will help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
MonthCalendar calUniversityCalendar = new MonthCalendar();
calUniversityCalendar.CalendarDimensions = new Size(2, 3);

MonthCalendar calUniversityCalendar = new MonthCalendar();
calUniversityCalendar.CalendarDimensions = new Size(3, 2);

MonthCalendar calUniversityCalendar = new MonthCalendar();
calUniversityCalendar.CalendarDimensions = new MonthCalendar(2, 3);

MonthCalendar calUniversityCalendar = new MonthCalendar();
calUniversityCalendar.CalendarDimensions = new MonthCalendar(2, 3);

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selection is: (B).
